metadata.title: CVE-2021-47614 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/irdma: Fix a user-after-free in add_pble_prmWhen irdma_hmc_sd_one fails, 'chunk' is freed while its still on the PBLEinfo list.Add the chunk entry to the PBLE info list only after successful setting ofthe SD in irdma_hmc_sd_one.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
